name: PostHog Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 PostHog Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume PostHog API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume PostHog API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: event

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: page

alias.name: alias
alias.natural_language_description: 参数名: Alias | 作用: The name of the alias | (必填项)

distinctId.name: distinctId
distinctId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Distinct ID | 作用: The user's distinct ID | (必填项)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: timestamp (值: None) - If not set, it'll automatically be set to the current time

eventName.name: eventName
eventName.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event | 作用: The name of the event | (必填项)
